about_the_game:
Welcome Player!


Step into the untamed realm of PRV, where the food chain takes center stage in this top-down multiplayer showdown! Choose your side and join the feathery flocks, cunning foxes, or slithering snakes as they engage in a battle of survival and cunning across various dynamic landscapes.

The Teams:


Choose a team! Each animals's goal is to eat and bring their prey back to the base to score points!
🐔 Chicken Team 🦊 Fox Team 🐍 Snake Team

Dynamic Gameplay Across Multiple Maps:


In PRV, the circle of life meets multiplayer mayhem across a multiple landscapes. Engage in thrilling matches where each team strives to capture their natural prey and return them to their base to feed their family! Chickens🐔 chase snakes, snakes🐍 swallow foxes, and foxes🦊 feast on chickens.

Be careful to use your stamina wisely, or you'll end up as another player's dinner!

Varied Environments, Varied Strategies:


Explore different maps, each with its own unique challenges and opportunities. Adapt your tactics to the different terrains, whether it's navigating dense forests, crossing open fields, or lurking in dark and mysterious swamps. The maps add an extra layer of strategy to the hunt.

Teamwork Wins


Coordinate with your teammates (or at least try to), strategize your attacks, and protect your own kind while targeting your natural enemies. Communication is key as you navigate the hunting ground.

Powerful Bonuses Await


At the center of the map, lies a powerful artifact... It generates bonuses that can turn the tide of the battle! Grab these power-ups to give your team an advantage – whether it's enhanced speed, freezing your preys, or even calling a powerful eagle to the battlefield, these bonuses could be the key to victory.

Victory Awaits:


Score points by successfully capturing your designated prey and delivering them safely to your base. Will you rise to the top of the food chain, or become a delicious meal for your natural predator?

Choose Your Side, Embrace the Hunt:


Whether you're a clucking chicken, a cunning fox, or a stealthy snake, PRV offers a unique multiplayer experience where survival is not just about strength but about wit, strategy, and mastering the art of the hunt.

Are you ready to step into this untamed arena? Join the battle, choose your team, join or face your friends, and let the food chain games begin!

name: PRV: Poultry Red-fox Viper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Enter the untamed world of PRV! Pick your side —Chicken, Fox, or Snake— and engage in a fierce multiplayer battle. Coordinate with teammates, and seize bonuses. Will you dominate the food chain? Join now and let the hunt begin! 🐔🦊🐍
